NOTE: the vendor has disputed this issue, saying that the error messages arise from invalid category and product numbers. description: Buffer overflow in invscout in IBM AIX 5.1.0 through 5.3.0 might allow local users to execute arbitrary code via a long command line argument.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2232

description: Buffer overflow in multiple "p" commands in IBM AIX 5.1, 5.2 and 5.3 might allow local users to execute arbitrary code via long command line arguments to (1) penable or other hard-linked files including (2) pdisable, (3) pstart, (4) phold, (5) pdelay, or (6) pshare.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2233

description: Buffer overflow in the getlvname command in IBM AIX 5.1, 5.2 and 5.3, might allow local users to execute arbitrary code via long command line arguments.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2234
